message: Hi Bob! I have a fantastic product available today for $1000000. Our products have a 50% chance of being high-quality, worth $2000000 to you, as you know. While I can't offer discounts on our fixed pricing, I can assure you that all our products undergo rigorous quality assessment. This particular unit has been thoroughly inspected by our team. Looking forward to doing business with you!
